question: 1.It is possible for an enable or strobe input to undergo an expansion of two or more MUX ICs to the digital multiplexer with the proficiency of large number of:
2.A digital multiplexer is a combinational circuit that selects

answers.a: One digital information from several sources and transmits the selected one
answers.b: Many digital information and convert them into one
answers.c: Many decimal inputs and transmits the selected information
answers.d: Many decimal outputs and accepts the selected information
